Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Wedding at Cana of Galilee:

Text.Language: Coou n~hudria m~mwou afaitou: n~ou/rp efcwtp: e~bolhiten pefnis] n~w~ou: qen p~hop n~t~Kana n~te ]Galilea~.
Six jars of water, He changed into chosen wine, through His great glory, at the wedding of Cana of Galilee.
ستة أجران ماء حولها إلى خمر مختار من قبل مجده العظيم فى عرس قانا الجليل.
